item.description:
Folks,

    The seating for this event is very limited!  In order to assure that you have a seat, I need for you to RSVP ASAP.  RSVP via the meetup, however, also, send me an email at dette101@gmail.com, please include your email so that I can add you to a special distribution list for attendees.  I need to make sure that I have enough materials and samples for everyone.  This will be a phenomenal event...also, check out my latest blog entry -

Do you have traits that are killing your chances to succeed?

 

    Also, please note that this event is taking the place of the event we normally have in Windham, NH.  I have updated that meetup, I hadn't realized it was still listed.  I apologize! 

    Make it a great day and in the words of Wayne Gretsky - "100 percent of the shots you don't take, don't go in!"  So, take your shot today! 

 

Folks this event is launching the Boston area of FDI Youngevity! Folks this is an ALL-STAR event! Million Dollar earners abound! VP of Training Steve Schulz, VP of Leadership Development Mike Randolph, #1 Rep of FDIY Sheryl Morley , PMD Maxandra DesRosiers, VPMD Annie Trajlinek and VPMD Bernadette Trafton will ROCK THE HOUSE! BOSTON will not know what hit them! Self-motivated, positve, high-powered people to network with! An opportunity presentation followed by the BEST training the industry has to offer! BE AT THIS EVENT!!! I haven't seen this much star power in a room since the National Convention!! Contact Bernadette at 603-505-8683, dette101@gmail.com for free entrance! Refreshments will be provided. ACT NOW, There is limited seating at this event RSVP today!

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: SAVE MONEY! GET HEALTHY! CREATE WEALTH! - Must RSVP TO Guarentee seating
